name: Peary Good Time
description:
How long can you take care of Peary for? Be careful, he's super needy and needs lots of love! 

Made for the Virtual pet jam but life and stuff got in the way! https://itch.io/jam/virtual-pet-jam

Controls: 

A and D -> Move from zone to zone

Mouse -> Swipe, click, drag

Credits:

Design + Code: Adam Marzilli

Art: Seanty Abraham

Music: Jonathan Della Penta

Font used: JinxedWizards by Christina Antoinette Neofotistou http://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/?id=1362
